essential-container.msg: ⚠️ Essentails detected! ⚠️ Essentials mod is redudant as an alternative is already present in the modpack - E4MC. Just press 'Host World' button in the pause menu.

optifine.msg: ⚠️ Optifine detected! ⚠️ OptiFine is incompatible with many modern mods and is also redundant due to how many performance mods are already included (with all of them greatly outperforming it).
